Proposal B: SQS + Lambda for ingestion/dispatch, write events to S3, and run a periodic batch reconciliation as fallback. We can ship in days, not weeks, and still have an immutable log for audit; we can migrate to Kafka after the deadline.

From Support: last month’s false-positive spike caused ~40 escalations and a few customers threatened churn. Whatever we choose needs tight filtering + a clear on-call playbook so we’re not guessing at 2am.

Can each proposal include expected throughput, failure modes, and how we’ll validate false-positive rate before rollout? If we’re picking the faster path, I want the rollback plan and ownership spelled out.
